mean_cn: n.和解，和好；修好；调停，调解
mean_en: an end to a disagreement and the start of a good relationship again; the process of making it possible for two different ideas, facts, etc. to exist together without being opposed to each other
sentence: After the argument, the two girls finally made up and hugged in reconciliation.
sentence_trans: 两个女孩在争吵后，最终拥抱和好了。
word_etyma: re重新 + con共同 + cil召集 + iation表名词 → 重新召集到一起 → reconciliation和解
